ygData.subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Re: Where should lvl 12 be?
ygData.msgSnippet: Great!  Glad to hear a fellow wizard is making nice progress.  Grouping is the way to go but soloing is good too.  The Karana s are nice for that.  You may
ygData.messageBody:
Great! Glad to hear a fellow wizard is making nice
progress. Grouping is the way to go but soloing is
good too. The Karana's are nice for that. You may
want to even try the lower level dungeons like
Befallen and Najena. Check the message boards for the
zones that had xp tables increased and head there for
more fun and xp!

Ziffnab, 53rd wizard
--- John Pool <jpool10550@...> wrote:
> ---I ended up going to Lvl 13 pretty soloing YKs and
> Willos in the WC,
> then really went fast to 14 in a Derv group in WC, i
> think i can make
> 15 pretty fast in these Dervs groups. Just thought i
> would let yall
> know about the WC seems good for 12-15 lvls.
>
>
>
